summary: SummaryCrave the glaze with Lifter Glaze Oil Balm from Maybelline. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid for lips so smooth and glowy - they're glazed.
details: DetailsFeaturesMaybelline's new next level lip balm melts to lips without feeling sticky or greasyLifter Glaze Oil Balm is formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, a hydrating oil blend, and Acerola Cherry Extract that hydrates lips for up to 24 hrs. This oil balm melts to lips for a glazed, smooth look and ultra-comfortable feelMaybelline New York Lifter Glaze Oil Balm delivers up to 24-hour hydration and a fuller lip look.Lip lines visibly reduced by 20 percent and after 4 weeks of daily use lips feel softer, look smoother and healthier. Based on immediate expert gradingThis hydrating lip balm has glazed pigments that tint lips in sheer, buildable color.Lifter Glaze is available in multiple glazed shades that last with up to 24-hour hydration that you craveKey IngredientsFormulated with Hyaluronic Acid, a Hydrating Oil Blend, and Acerola Cherry Extract that hydrates lips for up to 24 hrsItem 2639789How To UseSwipe Lifter Glaze onto lips. Keep glazing for more colorIngredientsPolyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Cellulose, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera / Sunflower Seed Wax, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Simmondsia Chinensis Butter / Jojoba Butter, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Candelilla Cera / Candelilla Wax / Cire De Candelilla, Parfum / Fragrance, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propylene Glycol, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Citric Acid, Magnesium Silicate, Silica, Tocopherol, Trihydroxystearin, Benzyl Benzoate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Benzyl Cinnamate, Tin Oxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Malpighia Punicifolia Fruit Extract / Acerola Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glucomannan. May Contain: Mica, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 15985 / Yellow 6 Lake, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, CI 45380 / Red 22 Lake, CI 15850 / Red 7, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake, CI 45380 / Red 21. (F.I.L. T70048721/4).
how_to_use: Swipe Lifter Glaze onto lips. Keep glazing for more color
ingredients: Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera / Sunflower Seed Wax
Candelilla Cera / Candelilla Wax / Cire De Candelilla
Malpighia Punicifolia Fruit Extract / Acerola Fruit Extract

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Love the product, very creamy moisturizing to the lips, and I love the colors long lasting by again

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love the colors

reviews.headline: A good 'dupe' for Clinique's Black Honey but...
reviews.comments: There are 2 things that may possibly be a problem (return). 1) Fragrance: there's a very "chemically" fragrance that might be trying to be vanilla, but it smells artificial. 2) Package design: it's boxy/bulky and I really question if the lid will stay on when in my purse.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This lip balm is a dupe for high end brands with a reasonable price. The packaging is cute and it moisture your lips with creamy texture. It has no string scent. It has many cute colors.

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] i absolutely love this shade! it applies so smoothly and it's so perfect. this is my favorite brand and i love all of the lip products but this one is by far my favorite!

reviews.headline: Its a no for me
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this.  I love lip oil it's pretty much the only lip color I use anymore so I thought lip oil in balm form would be awesome for me but not this one.  I got the hot pink shade.  Color is subtle. That's an understatement color was basically unnoticeable. Wish I could say the same for how it feels.  I don't usually use plumping products and this is why.  I found the tingling and stinging uncomfortable at best.  But certainly the color payout was not worth the discomfort. I usually get red shades and this time I got pink so I may still try the red one someday but I'll probably just save my money for something that shows up more and stings less.

reviews.headline: Great color!
reviews.comments: Would def buy again.

reviews.headline: I will buy every color!
reviews.comments: I love the consistency of these balms. I love the sheer wash of color but it's enough to be more than a gloss. I can wear these alone or with a liner either one. A+

reviews.comments: 007 is perfect for neutral pale olives 10/10

reviews.headline: I would maybe buy this
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Although the lip product looks beautiful on, it doesn't feel great on, unfortunately. At first it's ok, but then it becomes gritty over time which I hate.

reviews.headline: Awesome balm
reviews.comments: Got this on a whim since i am ovsessed with the lip liner. First off, it smells SO GOOD. Very light vanilla frosting scent, which was a nice surprise. Its not sticky and its a perfect balm/gloss hybrid. So affordable too!

reviews.headline: Hydrating with a glassy finish
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Maybelline Lifter Glaze is glossy, hydrating, and perfect for everyday wear. The formula feels lightweight but still gives a juicy, plumped look without being sticky. The shine payoff is strong, and it layers beautifully over lip liners or on bare lips. It has a smooth applicator that makes touch-ups easy, and the wear time is decent for a gloss. Affordable, comfortable, and a great dupe for high-end lip products if you love a glassy finish.

reviews.headline: Perfect dupe Clinique - Black Honey
reviews.comments: The Maybelline Lifter Glaze Oil Balm in Acai Glaze is an amazing dupe for Clinique's Black Honeyâ€”I'm beyond thrilled! You can snag nearly three of these for the price of one Black Honey, making it an absolute must-have. Perfect oil balm.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I LOVE this product. It has a beautiful finish of lasting long while first having a glossy finish but turning more satiny. The color berry haze is gorgeous and I will definitely repurchase

reviews.headline: Oil balm where?
reviews.comments: Was sent this for review! As a dry lip girl, this wasn't the most matte and drying product ever but it wasn't juicy either. Pigment was just okay and I really had to build it to get it to wear I wanted it.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: Great smooth mild gloss with amazing color long lasting

reviews.headline: Not what I expected - Berry Haze 007
reviews.comments:
First off, these do not come sealed. The shade didn't match the online swatch, but i tried it, anyway. 
Between the fragrance & stickiness of this balm.. it's a no go for me. 
Your mileage may vary, mine is going back asap.

reviews.headline: Glow
reviews.comments: Okay, it's super creamy and gives your lips a glow. They look super pretty without being heavy, perfect for everyday use. It always goes with me everywhere.

reviews.headline: Perfect sheer tint!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been loving the Lifter Glaze, especially the shade Latte Crush. It's such a nice color for fall and gives a light tint. Can't wait to keep using it. I definitely recommend!

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I recently started using the Maybelline Lifter Glaze Oil Balm and it's quickly become one of my favorites. It goes on super smooth and feels really lightweight on the lips, not sticky at all. It gives a soft, dewy shine that makes my lips look fresh and healthy, and it keeps them feeling moisturized even after it fades.

What I love most is the finish. It's glossy but not over the top, so it works great for everyday wear. The color is subtle but still flattering, and it layers really well over lip liner or lipstick if I want to add a bit more color. I've been reaching for the brownish caramel shade a lot. It warms up my fair skin and gives just the right amount of glow.

The packaging feels pretty luxe for a drugstore product, which is a nice bonus. The scent reminds me of the early 2000s and while it's not my favorite, it's light enough that I don't mind it.

I also tried the Maybelline Lipstick in Pink Dip and it pairs really well with the Glaze. The shade is a soft pink that gives my lips a fresh, natural look. It's more pigmented than the Glaze, so I like using it as a base when I want more color, then topping it off with the Oil Balm for shine. Together they give a full, juicy look without feeling heavy.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love these

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] There are some good ingredients, and some not-so-good ingredients in this lip balm. I like that it contains acerola (cherry) fruit extract, sunflower seed wax, jojoba butter, and hyaluronic acid. However, it also has an added fragrance, benzyl cinnamate, benzyl alcohol, and may contain multiple artificial colorings. Anyway, Pink Drip is a soft pink color, with an average gloss (not too shiny). Its scent is light and fruity, with a hint of shea butter. The balm had a smooth texture when I put it on, but after wearing it for a few hours, the texture became slightly sticky. As far as hydration goes, my lips didn't feel very moisturized, but they also didn't dry out. Inevitably, the lip balm got inside of my mouth and then onto my tongue a little. The balm tastes like chemicals, which isn't pleasant. I'm not sure about any lip line improvement because I haven't been using it long enough to tell that yet. I really like the packaging design because the base is squared and provides a solid surface to grip/hold onto. The cover goes over the top and clicks into place to keep the balm protected. Other than the smoothness of the application, the packaging was my favorite aspect about this lip balm.
faceoff_negative.headline: Can become slightly sticky
